Articles.Content:
The new Capricorn fleet has begun ! There are 4 space stations in orbit right now. Plus no mods!

Capricorn Alpha 0.5

Capricorn Beta 0.9

Capricorn Gamma 1.4

Sagittarius research lab station 0.3

"In production" 

Capricorn Delta

Capricorn Epsilon 

Capricorn Zeta

Capricorn Theta 

 

The lifting body was a mk2 booster with 6 boosters on the side. The main engine shuts down to save power to have energy to make the course. The second stage ejects after the boosters come off and when the first stage runs out of fuel. The second stage should have fuel to generate a course to make a space station stay in orbit. The CS Alpha has a very strange course. Looks like an egg yolk. Same with CS Beta. CS Gamma is the only one with a proper course. Almost all stations have Dawn engines that can detach from the small stations. I will give a download to the save game momentarily. You should probably come back to the page for further updates. There are some subassemblies like the Capricorn lifting body and the Sagittarius research lab station 0.3 Thanks for reading and please come back later for further updates in the future! 

 

 

My youtube channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCI5ZatD11IKoKkNDy6pWCJg

Edited April 18, 2017 by Trekkie148

Welcome aboard!

I've moved your post to Mission Reports.

Good luck with your channel!
